title: A solar desalination charger for water treatment and value-added chemical production
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00782D, Paper

Seonghun Kim, Dong Suk Han, Hyunwoong Park
This study presents a photoelectrocatalytic desalination charger for the remediation of aquatic pollutants and the production of value-added chemicals.
